Pembroke_Pines.Calder Casino:
Calder Casino is a casino in Miami Gardens, Florida, in the United States.

The casino opened in 2010 and contains a 100,000-square-foot (9,300 m2) gaming floor with 1,100 slot machines, including video poker, as well as electronic roulette and blackjack.
A player's club, VIP lounge, the Tropical Gardens Buffet, Lucky's Restaurant and Center Bar can all be found at the location.
